attributes.action: Grant an extra public holiday in the city of Hull
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the significant importance of 24th May to the City of Hull in general and the supporters of Hull City AFC in particular, we would like to be granted an extra public holiday on the anniversary of this date, in the event that Hull City survive relegation from the Barclays Premier League

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
